The season 4 American Idol winner is Carrie Underwood. 

Step 2: Has Kelly Clarkson outsold Carrie Underwood? 
To answer this, we can look at their respective record sales. According to Billboard, as of 2021, Carrie Underwood has sold over 70 million records worldwide, while Kelly Clarkson has sold over 25 million records worldwide. 
Since Carrie Underwood has sold more records than Kelly Clarkson, we can conclude that Kelly Clarkson has not outsold Carrie Underwood.

Since we have determined that Kelly Clarkson has not outsold Carrie Underwood, the answer to the question is (B) no.
